step_data.thought: Based on the accessibility tree, I can see that we're already on the Customers page. The URL ends with '/customer/index/', the page heading shows 'Customers', and I can see a customer record for 'Lily Potter'. This indicates we're already in the All Customers section where customer accounts can be viewed. The goal has been achieved.
step_data.action: stop('You are already in the All Customers section. The page is currently displaying customer accounts, including one for Lily Potter.')
